channel.title: Dr. Jianfei Yang on Jianfei Yang (Rocky)
channel.description: Recent content in Dr. Jianfei Yang on Jianfei Yang (Rocky)

item.title: Group
item.description: Hiring Ph.D. I am hiring Ph.D. students and CSC visiting students regarding the following research topics: Deep learning empowered AIoT sensing Transfer learning for data-efficient sensing Multimodal LLM for IoT The candidates are expected to have solid backgrounds on machine learning, deep learning or [wireless sensing]. Please drop an email to me with the title “PhD Application + [Name]”. Only the qualified candidates will be contacted.

item.title: Publications
item.description: For a full list of publications, please visit my Google Scholar. Book Chapters & Survey Deep Learning and Transfer Learning for Device-free Human Activity Recognition: A Survey Jianfei Yang, Yuecong Xu, Haozhi Cao, Han Zou, Lihua Xie In Journal of Automation and Intelligence, Elsevier, 2023 Fusion of WiFi and IMU using Swarm Optimization for Indoor Localization He Huang, Jianfei Yang, Xu Fang, Lihua Xie

item.title: Awards
item.description: I am keen on participating academic and industrial AI challenges to deal with real-world data problems. Awards in Academia First place, ICCV-21 Masked Face Recognition Challenge First place, IEEE CVPR 2019 UG2+ Challenge - Zero-shot Detection in Rain (Award: $60K) First place, PHI-Net Challenge by Pacific Earthquake Engineering Research Center, Los Angelos, USA [News] Third place, IEEE CVPR 2020 EmotionNet Challenge First place, ACM ICMI 2018 Emotion Recognition Challenge, Colorado, USA NTU Presidential Postdoctoral Fellowship Award (12/1000+) NTU EEE Best Thesis Award (2/400+) Awards in Industrial Challenges First place, WeChat Big Data Challenge - Multimodal Video Classification (Award: $60K) First place, Alibaba A-tech Challenge 2021 - Transaction Fraud Detection First place, DIGIX Global AI Challenge - Product Image Retrieval (Award: $35K) [News] First place, Xinye Cup 2021 - Intelligent Retail AI Solution (Award: $10K) First place, JD Global Data Challenge 2017 - Livestock face recognition (Award: $100K) [News] First place, HUAWEI Garbage Recognition Challenge (Award: $35K) [IEEE News] First place, Buildathon of Singapore by Ministry of Education Second place, Microsoft Imagine Cup 2017 (2/782) First place, China Mobile Internet of Things Hackathons (Award: $15K) Third place, National AI Challenge - Person Re-identification (Award: $35K) First place, Microsoft Beauty of Programming (BoP-16) Challenge by Microsoft Research Asia/IEEE (1/20000+) First place, Humanoid Robotics Hackathon by ALDEBARAN Awards in Subject Competition First Prize, National Mobile Internet Innovation Contest 2015 (China) First Prize, National Undergraduate IOT Design Contest 2014 by MOE (China)

item.title: Friends
item.description: Seniors I am honored to have seniors who guide me or lend me a hand selflessly. Dr. Han Zou - Research Scientist, Meta Dr. Zhenghua Chen - PI, Lab Head, A*star Dr. Kexin Guo - Associate Prof, BUAA Dr. Chen Wang - Project Scientist, CMU Dr. Zuozhu Liu - Assistant Prof, ZJU-UIUC Dr. Chris Xiaoxuan Lu - Assistant Prof, University of Edinburgh Dr. Yancheng Yuan - Research Assistant Professor, PolyU Daisy Yue Ai - CEO, Look Capital Juniors I am very happy to help my smart juniors, and grow up with them.

item.title: Patents
item.description: US Patents WO2020037313 - Device-Free Human Identification and Device-Free Gesture Recognition WO2019226910A1 - Unsupervised WiFi-Enabled Device-User Association for Personalized Location-based Service Chinese Patents CN109359539B - Attention Assessment Method and Device, Terminal Equipment and Computer Readable Storage Medium CN108344416A - WiFi-based Localization Method based on Cartographic Information Auto-Matching Target Singapore Provisional Patent Applications 2022-338-01-SG - An AI-Enabled Fire Burn Recognition Approach For Fire Accident Analysis 2022-326-01-SG - A Unified AI-Enabled Structural Health Monitoring Framework NTU Technical Disclosures 2022-093 - Human Respiration Sensing System based on WiFi Signals 2022-137 - A Localization Approach Based On Variational Inference Using IMU And WiFi RSS 2022-138 - Advanced Particle Swarm Optimization To Localization With IMU And WiFi Measurements, And The Development Of Sensing Platform

item.title: Research
item.description: Research Interests My Research mainly focuses on Artificial Intelligence of Things (AIoT), where the state-of-the-art AI models are proposed and implemented in the edge devices and enables everything interconnected. Broadly speaking, I study how AI models empower IoT-enabled edge devices to sense the environment (i.e. AIoT Sensing), how AI models are efficiently deployed in resource-restrained environments (i.e. Efficient AI), how multi-modal IoT data can be represented to support decision-making in large language models (i.

item.title: Template
item.description: The main purpose of this article is to make sure that all basic HTML Elements are decorated with CSS so as to not miss any possible elements when creating new themes for Hugo.
